concept.definition: The protocol describes the steps to manage a particular health condition including monitoring, treatment, mitigation and/or follow-up
The protocol describes the appropriate use of a particular device (medical device, software, etc.)
The protocol describes the appropriate use of a particular medication including indications for use, dosages, treatment cycles, etc.
The protocol describes the set of steps to occur for study subjects enrolled in an interventional study

text.div:
ProtocolType

High-level categorization of the protocol

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/protocol-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
condition ConditionThe protocol describes the steps to manage a particular health condition including monitoring, treatment, mitigation and/or follow-up
device DeviceThe protocol describes the appropriate use of a particular device (medical device, software, etc.)
drug DrugThe protocol describes the appropriate use of a particular medication including indications for use, dosages, treatment cycles, etc.
study StudyThe protocol describes the set of steps to occur for study subjects enrolled in an interventional study
